title: The Legacy of Sparta
description: In the period when Agesilaus II and Pausanias reigned Sparta, General Theron and a group of faithful Spartans will be forced to embark on a journey motivated by ambition and ego. This will lead them to meet Marco Furio in his beginnings of what would later be one of the greatest known world powers. An adventure that will allow us to better understand the world of the Spartans, their way of thinking and understanding the world.
author: Christian Zamora Salamanca
